descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: LaMelo Ball hauls in the rebound and flings a Hail Mary pass to Gordon Hayward, who finishes with a fadeaway jumper.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Ball launches a full-court pass to Hayward) 2021/01/11 ESHEET

videos.headline: Ball launches a full-court pass to Hayward

videos.description: Bismack Biyombo dishes the quick pass to Gordon Hayward who soars to the rim and jams it in.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Biyombo connects with Hayward for the slam) 2021/01/11 ESHEET

videos.headline: Biyombo connects with Hayward for the slam

videos.description: LaMelo Ball works hard to get to the rim and makes defenders pay with a swift underhanded layup.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (LaMelo showing off his skills before knocking down the bucket) 2021/01/11 ESHEET

videos.headline: LaMelo showing off his skills before knocking down the bucket

videos.description: Coming off a steal by Devonte' Graham, the Hornets work the ball down the court and Caleb Martin finishes it off with a rim-rattling dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Hornets set up Martin for the transition slam) 2021/01/11 ESHEET

videos.headline: Hornets set up Martin for the transition slam
